## Overview

The meaning of an [doc://com.apple.naturallanguage/documentation/NaturalLanguage/NLDistance] is directly related to the [doc://com.apple.naturallanguage/documentation/NaturalLanguage/NLDistanceType] you use when you call a method that uses it. For example, if you use the [doc://com.apple.naturallanguage/documentation/NaturalLanguage/NLEmbedding/neighborsForString:maximumCount:distanceType:] method and use [doc://com.apple.naturallanguage/documentation/NaturalLanguage/NLDistanceType/cosine] for the `distanceType` parameter, the method calculates the cosine distance and returns it as an [doc://com.apple.naturallanguage/documentation/NaturalLanguage/NLDistance].

# NLDistanceType

**Enumeration**

The means of calculating a distance between two locations in a text embedding.

## Declaration

```swift
enum NLDistanceType
```

## Overview

The meaning of an [doc://com.apple.naturallanguage/documentation/NaturalLanguage/NLDistance] is directly related to the [doc://com.apple.naturallanguage/documentation/NaturalLanguage/NLDistanceType] you use when you call a method that uses it. For example, if you use the [doc://com.apple.naturallanguage/documentation/NaturalLanguage/NLEmbedding/neighborsForString:maximumCount:distanceType:] method and use [doc://com.apple.naturallanguage/documentation/NaturalLanguage/NLDistanceType/cosine] for the `distanceType` parameter, the method calculates the cosine distance and returns it as an [doc://com.apple.naturallanguage/documentation/NaturalLanguage/NLDistance].

## Distance Types

- **NLDistanceType.cosine**: A method of calculating distance by using cosine similarity.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
